title: A handful of essaies. Or Imperfect offers: by W: Mason Master of Arts
author: Mason, William, M.A.
publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathewes for Iohn Grismand, are are to bee sold in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne,
notes: Running title reads: A handfull of essaies.
The last four leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
